reason: Non-standard notation: The angle bracket notation C<g_1,...,g_n> is non-standard and ambiguous. Standard notation would be: (1) C[g_1,...,g_n] for polynomial algebra, (2) C⟨g_1,...,g_n⟩ for free algebra with proper delimiters, (3) Or explicit construction as quotient of tensor algebra. What precisely does this notation mean?
